data.name: The Rotating Dungeons of Starfall Spire
data.detailed_description:
Updates and Community

Evil Art Bunny Studios Discord: https://discord.gg/evilartbunnystudios

Alchemist's Mountain is a classic platforming puzzle dungeon adventure with a literal twist! Rotate the entire dungeon to manipulate blocks, water, gravitational beams, and many other elements, to reach each dungeon's menacing Boss. Chart your path through an undead army and mechanical guardians, to the pinnacle of the Starfall Spire where legends rumor lie the secret to immortality and everlasting wealth.

Development

Alchemist's Mountain was born in Metroidvania Jam 2, where it won first place! And since then its concept has been developed and refined by a solo indie dev (while changing nappies and extracting teeth).

data.short_description: Alchemist's Mountain is a classic platforming puzzle dungeon adventure with a literal twist! Rotate the dungeons to solve them and chart your path to the pinnacle of the Starfall Spire where legends rumor lie the secret to immortality and everlasting wealth.
data.reviews:
“Alchemist’s Mountain has a lot of potential. If the levels get more complex as the game goes on, this could be among my favorite platform games in recent memory.”
Cheep Games

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.3
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
